mapper.select: SELECT A. iuser, A.nm, A.created_at AS createdAt, A.pic , COUNT(DISTINCT B.ifeed) AS feedCnt , COUNT(C.ifeed) AS favCnt , D.following, D.follower, D.followState FROM t_user A LEFT JOIN t_feed B ON A.iuser = B.iuser LEFT JOIN t_feed_fav C ON B.ifeed = C.ifeed INNER JOIN ( SELECT SUM(if(from_iuser = #{targetIuser}, 1, 0)) AS following , SUM(if(to_iuser = #{targetIuser}, 1, 0)) AS follower , ( SUM(if(from_iuser = #{loginedIuser} AND to_iuser = #{targetIuser}, 1, 0)) + SUM(if(from_iuser = #{targetIuser} AND to_iuser = #{loginedIuser}, 2, 0)) ) AS followState FROM t_user_follow ) AS D WHERE A.iuser = #{targetIuser};
